original_title: Die Entscheidung – Wilm führte ein Doppelleben
overview: The prevailing postwar opinion that there was nothing to oppose National Socialism is contradicted by the example of the meeting of Władysław Szpilman and Wilm Hosenfeld. contradicted. Supported by the open, visual form of artistic imagery, the encounter is portrayed. is portrayed. The discourse is opened, civil courage has the floor.
title: The decision - Wilm led a double life
